text: Shadow of the Vampire is a 2000 independent period vampire Gothic mystery movie directed by E. Elias Merhige and written by Steven Katz. The movie stars John Malkovich and Willem Dafoe. It is a fictional version of the making of the classic vampire movie Nosferatu, eine Symphonie des Grauens, during which the movie crew begin to think their lead actor, Max Schreck, is a vampire. ==References== Category:American horror movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American independent movies
title: Shadow of the Vampire
